name: Support Base SPRL
goal: We are an independent event business, working with organisations in supporting dialogue between EU policy-makers, policy-formers and the wider stakeholder community, through the organising of seminars, conferences, debates, meetings and exhibitions, mainly, but not exclusively in the healthcare, health provision and pharmaceutical sectors. We have been working alongside MEPs across all political groups in the European Parliament since 2005 to this end.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Sport, Trade, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: We are often retained to implement events in support of specific topics and policy areas - the most recent being around the following policy areas. Smoking cessation, understanding Lung Health in Europe, Tuberculosis in Europe, World Sight Day exhibition and dinner debate, Cervical Cancer MEP/Stakeholder Summit and Disruptive Innovation in Healthcare.
